[那]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *naːl, *naːlʔ, *naːls ): phonetic 冄 ( OC *njam, *njamʔ ) + semantic 邑 ( “ city ” ) .
Originally the name of a state; later borrowed for a distal demonstrative .

[㑚]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 ): semantic 亻 + phonetic 那 ( OC *naːl, *naːlʔ, *naːls ) .

[儷]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *reːls ): semantic 人 ( “ person ” ) + phonetic 麗 ( OC *reːls, *rel ) .

[俪]
simplified form of 儷
